metadata.inclusion: Press the key three times within 1.5 seconds.
metadata.exclusion: Press the key three times within 1.5 seconds.
metadata.reset:
1. Press and hold the key four times within 1.5 seconds, keeping it held on the 4th press
2. Wait for the LED to light up for 3 seconds, then turn off
3. Release the key within 2 seconds after the LED turns off
